resources.string: This activity will contain a list with favorite songs. "SQLLiteOpenHelper" (and "SQLiteDatabase") class will be necessary to store favorite songs.

This activity will contain a list with last played songs. In order to save a list with last played songs (which should be available even after a restart) we will need to use "SQLiteOpenHelper" class (and SQLLiteDatabase)

This activity will contain a list (ListView) with all the songs. The "MediaPlayer" class is necessary to play media files and SQLiteDatabase, SQLiteOpenHelper classes to store information about songs).

This activity will contain the settings of the application. The "SharedPreferences" class will also be used in this case in order to prevent settings going back to default after the application is restarted.
